data.description: Fair Isaac Corp. engages in the provision of decision management solutions. The company is headquartered in Bozeman, Montana and currently employs 3,855 full-time employees.  The firm is focused on using predictive analytics and data science to improve operational decisions. The firm operates through two segments: Scores and Software. The Scores segment includes the Company's business-to-business scoring solutions and services which give its clients access to predictive credit and other scores. This segment includes its business-to-consumer scoring solutions, including its myFICO.com subscription offerings. The Company’s Software segment includes pre-configured analytic and decision management solutions designed for a specific type of business need or process, such as account origination, customer management, customer engagement, fraud detection and marketing as well as associated professional services. This segment includes FICO Platform, a modular software offering designed to support advanced analytic and decision use cases as well as stand-alone analytic and decisioning software.
data.naics: Computer Systems Design and Related Services
data.name: Fair Isaac Corp
